name: Minimalism
the-point: Does owning fewer things actually make you happier, or is it just a trend for the wealthy?

name: Digital Nomadism
the-point: Is it possible to have a deep sense of 'home' if you move to a new country every 3 months?

name: Fast Fashion
the-point: Is it the consumer's fault for buying cheap clothes, or the company's fault for making them?

name: Social Media Privacy
the-point: Would you sell your entire browsing history for $1,000 a month?

name: The 5AM Club
the-point: Is waking up early a biological advantage or just a productivity myth?

name: Dating Apps
the-point: Have dating apps destroyed our ability to meet people naturally in the real world?

name: Meat Substitutes
the-point: Is a 'fake' burger that tastes real better for the world than a real burger?

name: Biohacking
the-point: Should we use science to 'hack' our bodies (cold plunges, fasting) or just let nature take its course?

name: Screen Time
the-point: Is a 'digital detox' actually useful, or do we just go back to our old habits immediately?

name: Public Transportation
the-point: Should all public transport be free to encourage people to stop driving cars?

name: Influencer Impact
the-point: Do influencers have a moral responsibility to be honest about their filtered photos?

name: Tipping Culture
the-point: Should tipping be abolished in favor of higher base wages for staff?

name: Work from Anywhere
the-point: If you could work from a beach but your pay was cut by 20%, would you take the deal?

name: Sustainable Travel
the-point: Is it hypocritical to travel the world to 'see nature' if the flight destroys the environment?

name: Longevity vs Quality
the-point: Would you rather live to 100 in average health or 70 in perfect health?

name: Subscription Boxes
the-point: Are subscription boxes (makeup, snacks, toys) a fun surprise or just a way to generate waste?

name: Education Path
the-point: Is a college degree still the 'safest' path, or is it becoming a financial trap?

name: Community Living
the-point: Would you live in a co-housing community with 20 strangers to save money and share chores?

name: Animal Testing
the-point: Is it okay to test life-saving medicine on animals if it saves millions of humans?

name: Personal Growth
the-point: Do people actually change their personalities, or do they just become more of who they already were?

name: The News Cycle
the-point: Is it better for your mental health to be 'uninformed' or 'over-informed' about world news?

name: Wealth Gap
the-point: Should there be a maximum limit on how much money one person can legally own?

name: Smart Homes
the-point: Do smart speakers (Alexa/Google) make us lazy, or do they truly add value to our lives?

name: Plastic Surgery
the-point: Is cosmetic surgery an empowering choice or a surrender to societal pressure?

name: Retirement Age
the-point: If we could live to 120, should the retirement age be moved to 90?
